description.short: Water Cooler is an app that enables user to create, invite and join conversations
description.full: Water Cooler is a custom Teams app that enables users of a given Tenant to create, invite, and join casual conversations among teammates, like those that take place by the Watercooler or break room. This app provides a snapshot of all concurrent conversations that users are engaging on varied topics. The logged in user could join one of the active conversations or choose to spin up a new one on a specific topic, inviting up to 5 colleagues. Once a conversation is kicked off, following the Teams meeting feature, one could add more people or chat with the group.
